moderator_initial_opinion:
I am Neutral or Undecided.

This statement can be seen as both valid and problematic, as it depends on the context and the intentions behind the character swap. On one hand, swapping fictional characters can be a creative way to explore different perspectives and challenge societal norms. On the other hand, it can also be seen as a form of cultural appropriation or disrespect if not handled thoughtfully.
